body:
New package, required to support the FEniCS 2018 and 2019 versions in the `fenics` package.

Predecessor of `py-fenics-ffcx` package (used for `fenics-dolfinx`).

Outsourced PR from [FEniCS 2019.1.0 PR.](https://github.com/spack/spack/pull/21207)
title: py-fenics-ffc: new package to support fenics
